snippet.title: Mecho Tales Trailer #2
snippet.description:
Releasing digitally on PlayStation Vita September 19!
Coming soon to PlayStation 4 and Nintendo Switch!
Limited Physical Edition published by Limited Run Games!

An all-new adventure in the world of Mecho Wars! Help Little Thief and Angel navigate over brutal stages of platforming action. Shoot an army of deadly robots with 8 distinct weapons and 360 degree aim.
